description: This is a deliciously boozy summer cocktail for true bourbon lovers out there. A simple mix of delicious bourbon-infused sweet cocktail cherries and vibrant summer lemons makes a cold thirst-quenching easy summer bourbon cocktail that truly lets bourbon shine

A Triple IPA is a high-gravity, hoppy beer that is brewed with a significant amount of malt and hops. Triple IPAs are known for their intense hop flavor and aroma, as well as their high alcohol content. 10% alcohol.

A rich dark chocolate with a touch of smoked vanilla, creating a cozy, campfire warmth in every sip. Finished with a toasted marshmallow and a drizzle of smoked chili caramel, it's the perfect way to wind down after a hearty meal.
